title: Leaf Latex

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: At night, visit another player, you will learn their suballignment.

desc:
Post 2899
*"If I had $1000 for how many time I've found one of these things in the Greenhouse instead of their bubble, I'd probably would have enough to repair the greenhouse. Not sure why they like it so much there, but they seem rather interested in how things work" -Dr.K███████, MIT.*
